A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan for many\, many years\, and had the pleasure of watching Empire and Return in the theaters when they came out. This installment left me leaving the theater asking \"what the hell just happened!?\" There are so many issues that it's hard to list them out. No real continuity and so much did not make sense. All in all\, this movie felt forced and as if 30+ people were trying to direct it all at the same time. I encourage people to go and see the movie for themselves\, but I don't hold any misconception that when they do\, they will come to a different end result.
